resources.string:
Hi I, Amol Saxena who is the Developer of this App. I am Currently persuing B.Tech in Computer Science And Engineering,from Lakshmi Narain College of Technology, Bhopal.I built this app Because personally i liked Diary Writing So i thought there may be a app in which we can easily writes our thoughts, personal issue, personal thing, and Those thing We want to remember with date we can also write our daily expense May be this app is not much great but i 'll make this app good with your reviews and thoughts. This is just my small effort to make a app which helps us to take notes and write our Feelings in Free time. As we all know how much Writing our thought impact us in very happy way.
Contact me: 7248543060, email me: amolsaxena060@gmail.com
So Enjoy..!!
